title: For Life (english ver)
lyrics: This life has twist and turns But it's the sweetest mystery When you're with me We say a thousand words But no one else is listening I will be Every night and every day We're in this thing together The dark turns to light We both come alive, tonight I'm talking bout forever Never gonna let you go Giving you my heart and soul I'll be right here with you for life Oh, baby all I wanna do Is spend my every second with you So look in my eyes I'll be by your side The storms may come And winds may blow I'll be your shelter for life This love , this love I mean it till the day I die Oh, never gonna let you go Giving you my heart and soul I'll be right here with you for life Oh, baby all I wanna do Is spend my every second with you So look in my eyes I'll be by your side Yeah, look in my eyes I'll be by your side For life
